question: I am a type2 diabetic patient taking oral medication for diabetes , cholestorol, and uric acid.urine test revealed traces of albumin.blood test revealed creatinine level is 1.2 mg/dl. my uric acid is 5.8 mg/dl. now am in a critical situation? is it beyond the normal levels? is my kidney functioning properly? please help.
title: albumin trace in urine and creatinine level signifies kidney disorder?
